description:
Mailmon arrives with an invitation to the "Seven Code Meetup"! Ropuremon and Gomimon head out with everyone! But doesn`t it seem like Mailmon is acting strange...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Appmon-tachi no Akogare! Densetsu no Seven Code Kai!
The Dream of All Appmon: The Legendary Seven Code Meetup!
アプモンたちのあこがれ! 伝説のセブンコード会!
